GSD.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v5.4.119
GSD.description:
net:emac/emac-mac: Fix a use after free in emac_mac_tx_buf_send

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.119 by commit 55fcdd1258faaecca74b91b88cc0921f9edd775d, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit b9b17debc69d27cd55e21ee51a5ba7fc50a426cf. For more details please see the references link.
